title: Bronzies Normal/Ranked Party
body:
I'm looking for people to join me on a valiant quest to get out of bronze and also because, the more the merrier.
Add Me, Phraser.
We will be partying together in ranked draft.
When answering, just give what lanes you prefer and I'll add you or vice versa.
Thanks, Summoners
From, The Bronze Asian

replies.body: I'm cool if u need a support (y)
That's great, I'll add you I have a cousin who mains lucian
Hey me and my m8 r also stuck in bronze atm tired of all the toxic people we get grouped with wouldnt mind joining u on ur quest
Awesome, just tell me what lane you guys would like to go
